mapper.select: select * from movie where #{end} >= movie_num AND movie_num > #{start}
select b.director_name from movie_director a, director b where a.movie_num = #{movie_num} and a.director_num = b.director_num
select b.actor_name from movie_actor a, actor b where a.movie_num = #{movie_num} and a.actor_num = b.actor_num
select b.category_name from movie_category a, category b where a.movie_num = #{movie_num} and a.category_num = b.category_num
select * from movie_comment where movie_num=#{movie_num} order by comment_num desc
select mem_id from commentlike where mem_id = #{mem_id} and comment_num = #{comment_num}
select * from movie where movie_kor_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
select count(*) from movie where movie_kor_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.insert: select count(*) from movie where movie_kor_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.select: select count(*) from rating where #{member_num} = mem_num and #{movie_num} = movie_num
